cause.description:
Skin Cancer is a Preventable form of cancer. This organization is dedicated to the research and prevention of melanoma.
1. Skin Cancer is preventable.
2. There are simple ways to prevent it.
3. Wear high SPF sunscreen.
4. Wear a Hat or Cap to protect yout self from the sun.
5. Avoid exposure between 9 am and 3 pm.
cause.mission: Prevent and support research for melanoma
cause.name: Prevent Skin Cancer
